name: Bobs New Truck
description:
WARNING! 

Game is not finished and is currently being worked on!

The final version of the game will have more chapters and levels including some more crazy themes (Secret themes) along with interactive physics objects such as rocks and other little items to make your life harder and don't forget Bob he will be added as a rag-doll inside the car!

Bob bought a new truck and now he has decided to take the long way home.

Go with bob on an adventure of a lifetime from rocky lowlands to sandy beaches. 

Enjoy this 2D Physics car climber!
